faqs.question: What's the pricing for machines?
faqs.answer: During daytime pay-as-you-go (10:30 AM - 7:30 PM), it's $1 per machine or 4 for $3 (3 for $2 before 12:30 PM). For the 7:30 PM session, it's $11 for 1 machine or $22 for 2 machines. The $22 bundle is our best value as it includes all 6-packs, double actions, and letter X papers!

faqs.question: Do I get free paper cards with machine play?
faqs.answer: Yes! Spend at least $1 on machines to receive 1 free paper card. Spend $2 or more to get as many paper cards as you'd like for each game.

faqs.question: Can I mix paper cards and machines?
faqs.answer: No. Strictly no mixing of paper cards and machines. You must choose one or the other for your session play.

faqs.question: What are the Progressive Daub Tickets?
faqs.answer: We have two: 'Bingo Babes' played after the 4 PM Super 6 Jackpot ($200 guaranteed), and the 'Hornet Progressive' played after Letter X during the 7:30 PM session ($250 guaranteed).

faqs.question: Do I get a free U-PIK card every time I play?
faqs.answer: Yes! Every night you play the 7:30 PM session, you receive 1 free U-PIK card as our way of saying thank you.

faqs.question: What time does the main session start?
faqs.answer: The main session starts at 7:30 PM every night. Daytime pay-as-you-go games run from 10:30 AM until 7:30 PM.
